title: House in Piliyandala 02
details:
The most valuable property ever that you can obtain in an affordable price within the city limits.
This is a highly developed and luxurious housing scheme with in a gated community which gives you the security as well as privacy with all the facilities including swimming pools, open garden, cctv protected entrance, electricity, water etc. The prices are really affordable when considering with the area and development standard of the project.
